headline: AEP Ohio Proposal on Data Centers to Protect Ohio Consumers Adopted by PUCO
summary: AEP Ohio today recognized a ruling by the Public Utilities Commission of Ohio that addresses the power needs of Ohio's growing data center industry while protecting AEP Ohio's other customers.

headline: Bloom Energy Stock Is Getting a Big Beautiful Bump. An Analyst Sees More.
summary: J.P. Morgan upgraded shares of the fuel-cell maker to Overweight from Neutral. Trump’s spending bill has been a boon.

headline: American Electric Power Company (AEP) Bolsters Management Team
summary: American Electric Power Company Inc. (NASDAQ:AEP) is one of the 10 best defensive stocks to buy in a volatile market. On June 17, the company named a new general counsel and technology chief, expected to support its long-term strategy. Rob Berntsen will become executive vice president and general counsel, effective July 14. Berntsen joins American Electric […]

headline: What to Expect From American Electric Power's Next Quarterly Earnings Report
summary: American Electric Power is all set to release its fiscal second-quarter earnings later this month, and analysts project a low single-digit earnings decline.
